resources.string: Welcome to BakLink - the fastest way to share Instagram and Facebook videos as MP4. To use BakLink, share the video you need to share as mp4, to BakLink. BakLink will instantly start downloading the video. After the download is complete, Whatsapp will automatically open with the shared mp4! Currently BakLink supports Instagram videos, IGTV videos, Reels and Facebook videos. You can share videos directly to WhatsApp. So you need to have WhatsApp installed in your device.
For feedbacks and complaints contact frontdesk@ascalonic.com
